Posts.Content: Marni1 wrote: Hi guys, I finished Chemo and Radio beginning of 2012, but I still get the most horrible dreams, usually every night. Does anyone else have these, they are making me really depressed as they are so dismal. Is this common? But on the bright side my health is OK :) Dx 5/13/2011, IDC, 2cm, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 6/10/2011 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Bad Dreams/Nightmares after Chemo Marni1 Marni1
